name: My King!
description:
My King! is currently under development and has been made in a short period.

Fight for your king using their crown as the one weapon, whilst defending the land to claim for your king.

Controls:

( A ) = Dash (reflects projectiles, knocks back enemies)
( RT ) = Throw Crown (Hold to increase power)
( LT ) = Place Shield (deflects projectiles, hold to increase size, press again to recall and stun players)
